chapters.name: University of Waterloo
chapters.description: UWaterloo is our first Blueprint chapter, founded in 2015 🍁

chapters.name: UCLA
chapters.description: Blueprint at the University of California, Los Angeles was established in 2019 🚀

chapters.name: University of Toronto
chapters.description: We were very excited to establish the second Canadian chapter in 2020 🌿

chapters.name: UC Irvine
chapters.description: Our second Southern California Blueprint chapter was established in 2020 ♥️

chapters.name: Carleton University
chapters.description: Our third Blueprint chapter in Canada 🍂

chapters.name: University of Alabama
chapters.description: We were very proud to bring yet another BP chapter across the country ✨

chapters.name: University of Colorado Boulder
chapters.description: Blueprint Boulder is our first chapter in the Rockies, established in 2020 💕

chapters.name: Simon Fraser University
chapters.description: Established in 2023, SFU Blueprint is our newest chapter in Canada🍁
